title: STENDHAL_SYNDROME_DVDRIP_ENG-LGLuX.mp4
description:
Movie:    Stendhal Syndrome  (Syndrome di Stendhal)
Actor:    Asia Argento
Director: Dario Argento (nuf Said :-))
Codec:    h.264
Language: English
IMDB:    <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0117658" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0117658</a>




If you love THE STENDHAL SYNDROME, you love Argento, and that is that--you may see the flaws, but they don\&#039;t ruin your pleasure. The picture has too many Achilles heels to enumerate here, but what\&#039;s important is that nobody in world cinema today is wrestling with his soul in the psychosexual mire the way Argento does. He puts his misogynistic demons and his almost sentimental compassion right out there; and only Cronenberg has such a direct pipeline to his own unconscious. Not to mention the fabulous, cascading images--Argento\&#039;s stock-in-trade is Victorian Liebestod, Edward Gorey gone porno, and THE STENDHAL SYNDROME has sequences that rank with his best.

The sketchy thing about STENDHAL SYNDROME, like the maestro\&#039;s TRAUMA, is his use of his daughter, Asia Argento, in scenes one cannot imagine a father watching, much less filming. Whatever memoirs come down the pike twenty years later, it must be said: Argento for certain lets it all hang out, and the land-mined terrain he maps is, to my taste, thrilling.


Enjoy

LGLuX
